domain.piece.contracts

Interface IPiece

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDeepClonable<IPiece>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Dame, Piece

    public interface IPiece
extends IDeepClonable<IPiece>
    Represents a piece on the IBoard. Each IPiece has a Player. Pieces can have various capabilities, as defined by the methods in this interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canCatchBackward()
      Returns true if this IPiece can catch backwards, false otherwise.
      boolean canFly()
      Returns true if this IPiece can fly, false otherwise.
      boolean canPromote()
      Returns true if this IPiece can promote, false otherwise.
      boolean canStepBackward()
      Returns true if this IPiece can step backwards, false otherwise.
      IPiece getDeepClone()
      Returns a clone of this IPiece of the same type with the same Player.
      char getPieceCode()
      Returns a character representing the type and Player of this Piece.
      Player getPlayer()
      Returns the Player that owns this Piece.

    • Method Detail
